poll.h
======

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`IO <io.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares I/O multiplexing functions.

You can use the functions provided in this file to perform I/O
multiplexing.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0
